faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What is a temporary email address?
faq.a1: A temporary email address is a disposable email that you can use for short-term purposes, like signing up for a service or receiving a one-time password (OTP). It protects your real email from spam and phishing.
faq.q2: How long does a temporary email last?
faq.a2: Our temporary email addresses typically last for 30 minutes, which is enough time to receive and read any verification emails or OTPs.
faq.q3: Is it safe to use Temp Mail OneTap?
faq.a3: Yes, it is safe. We do not store any personal information, and all emails are automatically deleted after they expire. It's a great way to keep your primary inbox clean and secure.
faq.q4: Can I send emails using this service?
faq.a4: Temp Mail OneTap is designed for receiving emails only. This helps prevent the service from being used for spamming purposes.
faq.q5: Do I need to sign up to use the service?
faq.a5: No signup or registration is required. You get an instant email address as soon as you visit the site.

about.title: About Temp Mail OneTap
about.p1: Temp Mail OneTap provides free, secure, and disposable email addresses. Our goal is to protect your online privacy by providing a temporary inbox for those situations where you don't want to share your primary email address.
about.p2: Whether you are signing up for a new service, downloading a whitepaper, or needing a one-time verification code (OTP), our service ensures that your real inbox stays free from spam and potential security threats.
